mn7:4.1_2: bhikkhu ‘abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditvā abhijjhāvisamalobhaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;

mn7:5.3_0: iti viditvā byāpādo cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;

mn7:5.33_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti;
mn7:6.2_0: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti;
mn7:7.2_6: Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo,
mn7:8.1_0: Yathodhi kho panassa cattaṁ hoti vantaṁ muttaṁ pahīnaṁ paṭinissaṭṭhaṁ,
mn7:11.1_0: ‘Yathodhi kho pana me cattaṁ vantaṁ muttaṁ pahīnaṁ paṭinissaṭṭhan’ti labhati atthavedaṁ,
mn7:12.1_2: bhikkhu evaṁsīlo evaṁdhammo evaṁpañño sālīnañcepi piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjati vicitakāḷakaṁ anekasūpaṁ anekabyañjanaṁ,
mn7:12.2_2: vatthaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ malaggahitaṁ acchodakaṁ āgamma parisuddhaṁ hoti pariyodātaṁ,
mn7:12.2_3: ukkāmukhaṁ vā panāgamma jātarūpaṁ parisuddhaṁ hoti pariyodātaṁ;
mn7:12.3_2: bhikkhu evaṁsīlo evaṁdhammo evaṁpañño sālīnañcepi piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjati vicitakāḷakaṁ anekasūpaṁ anekabyañjanaṁ,
mn7:13.1_0: So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
mn7:13.1_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
mn7:16.1_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
mn7:16.1_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
mn7:17.1_3: atthi imassa saññāgatassa uttari nissaraṇan’ti pajānāti.
mn7:18.1_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
mn7:18.3_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
mn7:19.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti.
mn7:19.2_0: Atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn7:19.3_0: “gacchati pana bhavaṁ gotamo bāhukaṁ nadiṁ sināyitun”ti?
mn7:19.6_6: bāhukāya pana nadiyā bahujano pāpakammaṁ kataṁ pavāhetī”ti.
mn7:20.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā sundarikabhāradvājaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
mn7:21.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn7:21.3_5: andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya—cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantīti;
mn7:21.3_6: evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
mn7:21.4_0: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
mn7:21.5_0: Labheyyāhaṁ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadan”ti.
mn7:22.1_0: Alattha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
mn7:22.2_0: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
mn7:22.2_2: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
mn7:22.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
mn7:22.4_0: Aññataro kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṁ ahosīti.
